meanings.definition: A member or supporter of the Republican Party.
meanings.sent1: Many republicans attended the political rally.
meanings.sent2: The republicans voted for their party's candidate.
meanings.sent3: The group of republicans shared a pizza after the meeting.
meanings.sent4: In the debate, the republicans stood firm on their beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The republicans proudly displayed their party pins.

meanings.definition: A person who advocates or supports a republican form of government.
meanings.sent1: As a republican, he believes in the power of the people.
meanings.sent2: The founding fathers were republicans who valued democracy.
meanings.sent3: The little girl declared herself a republican of the playground.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were so revolutionary, they called him the republican rebel.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained to the students what a republican is.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the Republican Party.
meanings.sent1: The republican candidate gave a speech at the convention.
meanings.sent2: Her republican views aligned with the party's platform.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with republican-themed colors.
meanings.sent4: The republican logo was proudly displayed on the banner.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with republican supporters cheering.
